articles.title: Korean Intellectuals Receive Birthday Spreads
articles.content:
Korean Intellectuals Receive Birthday Spreads
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent birthday spreads to Dr. Kim Bong Gi, a designer at the Hamhung Chemical Designing Institute, on the 80th birthday, and Candidate Academician, Prof. and Dr. Ryu Sun Ryol, a counselor at Kim Chaek University of Technology, on the 70th birthday.
					 Kim Bong Gi, a winner of the titles of Labor Hero and People's Designer, was born in Unchon County of South Hwanghae Province and experienced the sorrow of being a member of a stateless nation. He graduated from a university after the country's liberation and has contributed to the development of the country's chemical industry, working as a designer at the Hamhung Chemical Designing Institute for decades.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il saw to it that he was awarded the titles of Labor Hero and People's Designer and doctorate.
					
					 Ryu Sun Ryol, a winner of the title of Merited Scientist, was born as a son of an ordinary official of Chongryon and graduated from Kim Chaek University of Technology after coming to the socialist homeland. Since then he has devoted all his wisdom and zeal to the development of the country's IT industry and the education of rising generations for 45 years.
					
					 He carved out scores of subjects of study, wrote a number of books, textbooks and reference books, and trained many holders of academic degree and presented valuable research findings.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Flails U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves over Cyber Issue
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Flails U.S. Anti-DPRK Moves over Cyber Issue
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA on December 21 over the fact that the United States is pointing its finger at the DPRK with regard to the issue of cyber-attack:
					 The United States is now inciting the global confrontation against us by forcibly linking to the DPRK the latest incident of cyber-attack which has given rise to a great international outcry.
					
					 The U.S., a source of all social evils and a state of global cyber-crimes, is unreasonably accusing the DPRK without any forensic evidence. This cannot be construed otherwise than an expression of its inveterate repugnance towards the DPRK.
					
					 As we have clearly stated on several occasions, we have nothing to do with cyber-attack and we do not feel a need to respond, on a case-by-case basis, to such absurd allegations of the U.S.
					
					 However, we can never tolerate the U.S. reckless move of using the issue of cyber-attack for the purpose of making direct accusation against our state.
					
					 This move is a grave political provocation by the U.S. aimed at inducing the international society into a confrontation against the DPRK by tarnishing the image of the dignified country and demonizing it, as the U.S. is now driven into a corner as a result of the DPRK's achievement of great cause of completing the state nuclear force. The U.S. move is also a direct challenge to our system and political power.
					
					 Crystal clear is the purpose of the U.S. trying to link us to the issue of cyber-attack at this very moment when it is hell-bent on making a harshest "sanctions resolution" against us.
					
					 The main ulterior intention of the U.S. is to create an atmosphere of sanctions and pressure against the DPRK by branding the latter as a "criminal state" even in cyber issue, not being content with the nuclear issue and the "human rights issue".
					
					 The Trump administration is inciting an extremely confrontational atmosphere by even concocting a plot against us at this delicate moment when the situation on the Korean peninsula is at the crossroads of nuclear war or peace. This only betrays the true colors of the U.S. as the main culprit of the aggravated situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We will never tolerate the U.S. reckless moves against the DPRK and make all our efforts for defending our state and system.
					
					 We would also warn those countries unreasonably following in the footsteps of the U.S. indulging in the anti-DPRK plots.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Swedish Government Visits DPRK
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Swedish Government Visits DPRK
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Member of Parliament Kent Rolf Magnus Harstedt, who is special envoy of the government of the Kingdom of Sweden, and his party visited the DPRK from Dec. 19 to 21.
					 During the visit, the special envoy paid courtesy calls on Ri Su Yong, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, and Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho and had talks with Vice Foreign Minister Han Song Ryol.
					
					 There were a discussion on the matter of expanding the bilateral relations in various fields and exchange of views on the recent situation of the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Vice-chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK
articles.content:
Vice-chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Lodging Quarters of Participants in Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK
Pyongyang, December 21  (KCNA) -- Vice-chairmen of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the lodging quarters of the participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the WPK on Wednesday.
					 They included Pak Kwang Ho, Kim Phyong Hae, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Choe Hwi and Pak Thae Dok, vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 They encouraged the participants in the conference who have made devoted efforts in the van of the campaign for firmly turning party cells into genuine advance guards true to the party's idea and cause and winning the final victory in building a powerful socialist nation with the honor of being primary officials of the party.
					
					 They called upon the participants to radically improve their work as required by a fresh high stage of the development of revolution and thus fulfill their mission and duty in dynamically arousing party members and working people to the campaign for implementing the decisions made at the 7th Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Participants in Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the historical data and mementoes displayed at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum, they recollected once again the careers of Kim Il Sung and his family members.
					
					 They looked round the historic mementoes preserved at the old home at Mangyongdae with much care.
					
					 They also toured the Party Founding Museum dealing with the party-building exploits of Kim Il Sung and the Korean Revolution Museum that successfully turned into the great seat of education of revolutionary tradition.

articles.title: Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) met at the Central Hall of Workers Thursday to celebrate the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Ju Yong Gil, chairman of the C.C., GFTUK, made a report at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers noted that the Korean People's Army could invariably keep its character as the Party's revolutionary armed forces and reliably guarantee the socialist cause of Juche with arms, thanks to Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 They stressed that the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk was the most noble and sublime one of a great revolutionary who devoted her all to the prosperity and bright future of the country and nation.
					
					 They said that the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt Paektu is now given a steady continuity under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They vowed to further demonstrate the revolutionary stamina of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class in the ongoing grand march for implementing the decision made at the 2nd plenary meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, united closer around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Women's Union Members Visit Hoeryong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Women's Union Members Visit Hoeryong Revolutionary Site
Hoeryong, December 21 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea in Pyongyang and provinces visited the Hoeryong Revolutionary Site on Thursday ahead of the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statue of Kim Jong Suk at the foot of Osan Hill and paid tribute to her.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Suk nurtured the anti-Japanese patriotic will, experiencing the sorrow of being a member of a stateless nation since her childhood and grew up to be an ardent revolutionary, they looked round historic mementoes preserved at her old home.
					
					 At the Hoeryong Revolutionary Museum they recalled her revolutionary career with deep emotion.
					
					 They also went round the Mangyang Ferry through which Kim Jong Suk crossed the Tuman River with her family members in spring of 1922, hardening her will not to come back home before the country's liberation.
					
					 On the same day, the officials and members of the women's union toured Kim Ki Song Hoeryong Senior Middle School associated with the traces of leader Kim Jong Il and others.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., UAWK
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of C.C., UAWK
Kangso, December 21 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) gave a performance at the Thaesong Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City on Thursday to celebrate the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 The numbers of the performance included female folk solo "We Will Hold Our General in High Esteem", male quartet "Mother Is Always with Red Flag", and male solo "Korea, Forward under the Line of Simultaneously Developing the Two Fronts".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il who defended Korean-style socialism under the banner of Songun and laid an eternal foundation for the final victory of the Juche revolution.
					
					 A dialogic poem "Recollection of Mother" hardened the agricultural workers' will to glorify the feats of Kim Jong Suk who devoted her all to the struggle for Korea's liberation and the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The performance also well represented the agricultural workers' strong resolve to remain intensely loyal to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the C.C., UAWK, officials concerned and officials of the union and agricultural workers.

articles.title: State Commendations to Persons for Distinguished Merits in Science Research
articles.content:
State Commendations to Persons for Distinguished Merits in Science Research
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- State commendations were awarded to scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and Three Revolution Team members for their distinguished merits in the science research work.
					 Ri Hyon Gwang and Ryu Song Un received Kim Jong Il Prize, Ri Kang Hyon a watch bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung, Ro Yong Chil a watch bearing the august name of leader Kim Jong Il, Ri In Su, Ko Chol Ryong, Jon Sung Chil, Ha Su Gil, Pak Chan Bin, Ji Kyong Hun and Yu Kyong Su a citation of Chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jong Un and Ri Un Ju and Ham Un Chol Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize.
					
					 The title of People's Scientist went to four persons, the title of Merited Scientist to nine persons and the title of Merited Technician to four persons.
					
					 17 persons were awarded Order of National Flag First Class and 87 persons Order of Labor and Order of National Flag Second Class.
					
					 A ceremony of awarding the state commendations for Juche 106 (2017) took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Thursday.

articles.title: National Sci-tech Presentation in Chemical Material Field Held
articles.content:
National Sci-tech Presentation in Chemical Material Field Held
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the chemical material field took place at the Sci-Tech Complex on Dec. 20-21 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Attending it were teachers, researchers, post-graduate students and others from different units including Kim Il Sung University, Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering and the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 More than 160 papers were presented to it, divided into panels of inorganic, organic and compound materials and chemical material analysis. 
					
					 There were lectures and video show on the latest chemical materials.

articles.title: Brilliant Life Glorified with Arms
articles.content:
Brilliant Life Glorified with Arms
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- December 24 this year is the centenary of the birth of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 On this occasion, people in the DPRK are recollecting with deep emotion the brilliant life of Kim Jong Suk who had reliably upheld the Songun idea of President Kim Il Sung with arms.
					
					 After joining the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), she was distinguished herself in guerrilla tactical training, political study, etc. and, in particular, had directed big efforts to improving her marksmanship.
					
					 There are many stories about her superb marksmanship. Among them are the stories about the battle near Mayihe, China in which she killed an enemy battalion commander at the first fire and about the battle of Naitoushan, China in which she shot to death an enemy officer at the distance of over 400 meters.
					
					 Her marksmanship was so marvelous that even her comrades-in-arms used to guess the number of killed enemies by counting empty bullet pockets of her cartridge belt after battles.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, she had devotedly safeguarded the KPRA headquarters in different battlefields including Fusong county town, Dashahe gully and Hongqihe.
					
					 Even after the liberation of Korea from Japan's colonial rule, she dedicated herself to the building of regular revolutionary armed forces, true to the line of army building set forth by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Indeed, Kim Jong Suk was a great woman revolutionary who made her whole life honorable together with the arms of the revolution.

articles.title: Over 10 Fishing Boats Newly Built
articles.content:
Over 10 Fishing Boats Newly Built
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been directed to building fishing boats in the DPRK this year.
					 The North Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau built over 10 ships including multipurpose "Hwanggumhae"-class fishing boat, carrier and angle fishing net boat.
					
					 The multipurpose fishing boats are equipped with modern fish detector, communication means and highly efficient fishing tackles.
					
					 The Jongju Fishery Station overfulfilled its annual shipbuilding plan by introducing advanced methods.
					
					 Cholsan and Unjon fishery stations built three multipurpose fishing boats and an angle fishing net boat in a short span of time.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Amnokgang Ship Repair Factory has produced tens of kinds of accessories.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea offers an occasion for strikingly manifesting the validity and vitality of the WPK's idea of prioritizing party cells, and marks a new milestone in consolidating the might of the single-minded unity between the party and the revolutionary ranks, says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial.
					 The conference would also serve as a watershed in spurring the all-people's all-out charge for opening up a decisive phase in building a powerful socialist nation, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 All the participants in the conference and all the cell chairpersons have to bring about a fundamental turn in the party cell work as wished by the WPK and with high honor and responsibility of standing guard over the outpost of the work for modeling the whole party and whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 The feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in building and leading the party become an eternal boon to be eternally held fast to and glorified by our party. We have to thoroughly embody the great leaders' idea of building a Juche-oriented party and give a steady continuity to the ever-victorious history and traditions of our party.
					
					 It is important to remain true to the idea of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on prioritizing the party cells, and his guidance.
					
					 It is his fixed will to enhance the militant function and role of the party cells in every way and further strengthen our party in terms of organization and ideology and thus step up the overall socialist construction.
					
					 Powerful is our party and invincible is the cause of Juche revolution as long as there are revolutionary and militant party cells standing in the van of the ranks of all-out drive that are braving manifold difficulties with the might of single-minded unity and self-development.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. Keen on Igniting War
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces U.S. Keen on Igniting War
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. waged a missile warning drill targeting the detection and tracking of ballistic rockets of the DPRK in the waters off the Korean peninsula in collusion with Japan and the south Korean puppet forces recently. This is the fourth one this year.
					 Commenting on the fact, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says the saber-rattling indicates that the U.S. is resorting to its last-ditch efforts to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is clearly evidenced by the open clamor made by the bellicose forces of the U.S. military that the purpose of the military exercises is to further the capabilities for neutralizing the key strategic targets of the DPRK in the early stage of war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This has clearly proved that the U.S. is the chief culprit escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula and harassing world peace and security.
					
					 In fact, the U.S. has made the war on the Korean peninsula a fait accompli.
					
					 Experts assert that what is necessary for the U.S. is escalation of tension and this becomes a pretext for all military actions of the U.S. in and around the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Sea blockade, a wanton violation of the sovereignty and dignity of an independent state which is little short of a war act, would lead to an unpredictable disaster if it becomes a reality.
					
					 The U.S. should be aware of this.
					
					 We do not want a war but do not avoid it.

articles.title: U.S. Will Face Final Ruin for Preemptive Attack on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Will Face Final Ruin for Preemptive Attack on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- An article of Rodong Sinmun Thursday says that the U.S. chief executive has gone desperate in his war frenzy as evidenced by his rhetoric that there can surely be a crucial conflict with Korea and that the way of military attack on Korea is being maintained and by the frequent mobilization of nuclear attack means.
					 It is the fixed will of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK to foil the aggression moves of the U.S. and completely eliminate the root cause of a nuclear war for the peace on the Korean peninsula and the region, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Words will not work on Trump, a man acting as a bully. War maniacs have to be tamed with fire just as a stick fits a rabid dog. This is the best way of ensuring lasting peace on the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 The U.S. is demonstrating its power after deploying strategic assets in and around south Korea in a bid to ignite a nuclear war. But we can never be browbeaten.
					
					 If even a slight sign of provocation of a war is detected, the U.S. and even its vassal forces will face merciless shower of fire beyond imagination by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					 The world will see how Juche Korea tames war maniacs with fire and how it defends peace on the Korean peninsula and the region.

articles.title: U.S. Is Murderer Which Plunged Kwangju into Bloodbath: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Is Murderer Which Plunged Kwangju into Bloodbath: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The May 18 Memorial Foundation of south Korea recently disclosed that the result of information found in a university library in the U.S. confirmed the fact that the U.S. planned to bomb Kwangju City at the time of May 1980 Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 It was also disclosed through the "newsletter on the situation during the May 18 Kwangju Uprising", kept at a puppet air force archive, that two days before launching the operation for quenching the Kwangju Popular Uprising the U.S. was expected to hurl MC-130 special operation transporter plane and that surveillance of Kwangju citizens was carried out through the use of the plane even after the uprising. Also made public was the fact that the U.S. planned to deploy AWACS and carriers Midway and Coral Sea in waters off south Korea from Kaneda U.S. air force base in Okinawa of Japan.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun says that this points to the undeniable historical facts that the chieftain which barbarously suppressed and massacred resistance fighters of Kwangju, who turned out for democracy and independence of society and reunification of Korea, and drenched the whole of Kwangju City with blood was none other than the U.S.
					
					 The reality proves that the U.S. is the blood-sucking beast and a wolf in human skin as it does not hesitate to commit any shuddering massacre in order to maintain its colonial domination system.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialists stay in south Korea, its people can not evade the second and third Kwangju disaster and the desire of Kwangju resistance fighters for independence, democracy and reunification can never come true. The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, the root cause of all misfortune and pain of south Koreans and all sorts of disasters faced by them, have to be withdrawn at once.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to face up to the desire and will of the people for independence and democracy, justice and progress and get rid of old bad habit of sycophancy toward the U.S.

articles.title: Papers Slash at Japanese Reactionaries' Fascist Suppression against Chongryon
articles.content:
Papers Slash at Japanese Reactionaries' Fascist Suppression against Chongryon
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Japan police authorities searched the headquarters and 11 branch offices of the Kumgang Insurance Company under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and also houses of its president and employees on Dec. 17, charging there is a sign that deposit was taken out and put into hiding from a bank account managed by the company.
					 Earlier, a combined investigation headquarters made up of the police in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi, Shimane and Niigata prefectures searched the office of the Korean Football Team in Japan and the house of former chairman of the Shibse branch of Tokyo metropolitan of Chongryon under the pretext of the investigation into a Japanese company's violation of law on foreign exchange.
					
					 Leading papers here Thursday brand this as a serious challenge to the DPRK and Chongryon and a hideous criminal act targeting the elimination of Chongryon.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says the Japanese reactionaries failed to gather any evidence related to the "suspected violation of law".
					
					 In actuality, the coercive search carried out by the Japanese reactionaries targeting Chongryon was not just for investigation into the "violation of law". This was a planned politically-motivated terrorist act to deliberately suppress Chongryon.
					
					 What is more serious is that the suppression was carried out at a time when all the officials of Chongryon and all the Koreans in Japan were wrapped in the memorial feelings on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. This fact alone is enough to prove that the search by the Japanese authorities was a sinister provocation aimed at meeting a political purpose.
					
					 Minju Joson says the more frantically the Japanese reactionaries resort to suppression of Chongryon despite the repeated warnings of the DPRK, the higher price they will be made to pay, and that the responsibility will rest with the Japanese authorities in entirety.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Russia
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Further Strengthen Our Single-Hearted Unity and Give Full Play to the Korean-Nation-First Spirit" was posted on the Russian website Irkutskblogspot. Ru on Dec. 14 ahead of the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on February 4, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the tasks and ways for further adding shine to Korean-style socialism by dint of single-minded unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Germany
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Germany
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk was formed in Germany on Dec. 6.
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold seminar, photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Suk, woman commander of Mt Paektu, in the period from Dec. 6 to 24.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Italy
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Communist Party of Italy on Dec. 7 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Flayed in Ecuador
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Flayed in Ecuador
Pyongyang, December 21 (KCNA) -- The Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador and the Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with the DPRK of Ecuador on Dec. 7 made public a joint statement to support the just cause of the Korean people and denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. re-listed the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" in a bid to bring down Korean style socialism.
					
					 Without dropping its ambition for aggression the DPRK, the U.S. is pursuing anti-DPRK propaganda and moves to stifle it. In particular, it has driven the situation on the Korean peninsula into the worst phase by getting hell-bent on the joint military exercises of aggression with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 We flatly blast the U.S. criminal hostile policy towards the DPRK and strongly demand that the U.S. take hands off the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. must lift the barbarous sanctions against the Korean people and cancel the re-designation of the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism". It also should accept the proposal of the DPRK for replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord.
					
					 The UN should desist from blindly toeing the U.S. line and fulfill its mission as an international body for the sake of Korea's reunification.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their vigorous struggle to protect peace in the Korean peninsula and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicitan a intelectuales que celebran sus cumpleanos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicitan a intelectuales que celebran sus cumpleanos
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un envio los alimentos de cumpleanos al Heroe del Trabajo, disenador del Pueblo y Dr. Kim Pong Gi, disenador del Instituto de Diseno Quimico de Hamhung, y al Cientifico Benemerito, Candidato al Academico, Prof. y Dr. Ryu Sun Ryol, profesor guia de la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, en ocasion del octogesimo cumpleanos del primero y el septuagesimo del segundo.
					Kim Pong Gi nacio en el distrito de Unchon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur en el periodo anterior a la liberacion de Corea. Despues de la emancipacion de la patria, el se graduo de la universidad e hizo aporte al desarrollo de la industria quimica nacional trabajando como disenador del susodicho instituto.
					
					Ryu, nacido como hijo de un funcionario de la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon), repatrio y estudio en la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek. Durante 45 anos despues de su graduacion, dedico todo lo suyo para el desarrollo de la industria IT y la educacion a las generaciones venideras.
					
					Allano decenas de asignaturas y escribio los libros, los manuales y los libros de referencia. Tambien, formo a muchos poseedores de titulos academicos y grados docentes y registro valiosos exitos en la investigacion.

articles.title: Vocero de MINREX refuta la acusacion de EE.UU. a RPDC con ataque cibernetico
articles.content:
Vocero de MINREX refuta la acusacion de EE.UU. a RPDC con ataque cibernetico
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada con respecto a que EE.UU. cuestiona a la RPDC vinculandola con el ataque cibernetico, el vocero del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio hoy la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos dias, EE.UU. levanta en la palestra internacional los alborotos conflictivos contra la RPDC vinculandola de modo coercitivo con el caso del escandaloso ataque cibernetico.
					
					Deviene una expresion de su veto cronico a la RPDC la acusacion infundada de EE.UU., fuente de males sociales de toda indole y Estado criminal cibernetico del mundo.
					
					Como hemos declarado claramente en varias ocasiones, no tenemos nada que ver con cualesquier ataques ciberneticos, ni tenemos la necesidad de responder uno por uno a las insistencias absurdas de EE.UU.
					
					Pero, no podemos tolerar jamas el hecho de que EE.UU. se atreve a vincular nuestro Estado con la ofensiva cibernetica.
					
					Esta locura de EE.UU., tan pasmado ante el perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, deviene una grave provocacion politica encaminada a manchar el prestigio del pais y enfrentar a la sociedad internacional con el pais socialista al "satanizarlo". Y constituye un desafio directo al regimen y al poder de la RPDC.
					
					Estos dias, EE.UU. se afana por la aprobacion de la "resolucion de sancion" superdura contra la RPDC. Por tanto, es muy claro el objetivo que persigue el en la nueva acusacion.
					
					Insatisfecho con las campanas contra la RPDC en los temas de armas nucleares y de "DDHH", el pais americano trata de levantar una oleada internacional anti-RPDC, describiendola como "Estado criminal" tambien en el tema cibernetico, he aqui su intencion principal. 
					
					Cuando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se halla en la encrucijada de la guerra nuclear o la paz, la administracion Trump inspira el extremado ambiente conflictivo con las demagogias contra la RPDC, lo que revela mas fehacientemente su faz verdadera de responsable del empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					La RPDC no estara con brazos cruzados ante las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU., sino hara todo lo posible para defender el Estado y el regimen.
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para llamar la atencion a algunos paises que se suman ciegamente a la campana intrigante anti-RPDC de EE.UU.

articles.title: Enviado especial del gobierno del Reino de Suecia visita a la RPDC
articles.content:
Enviado especial del gobierno del Reino de Suecia visita a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El parlamentario Kent Rolf Magnus Harstedt, enviado especial del gobierno del Reino de Suecia, y su comitiva visitaron del dia 19 al 21 a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Durante su permanencia, el enviado especial realizo las visitas de cortesia a Ri Su Yong, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la comision de relaciones exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC, y Ri Yong Ho, ministro de Relaciones Exteriores, y sostuvo conversaciones con el vicecanciller Han Song Ryol.
					
					En las ocasiones se debatio el problema de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones bilaterales en varios dominios y se intercambiaron las opiniones relativas a la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun publica editorial dedicado a V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de Partido
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun publica editorial dedicado a V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas de Partido
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun hizo publica este jueves el editorial senalando que la V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sirve de una oportunidad para manifestar plenamente la justeza y la vitalidad de la idea del PTC de dar importancia a las celulas del Partido y constituye un nuevo jalon en el trabajo para consolidar mas el poderio de la unidad monolitica del Partido y las filas revolucionarias.
					Tambien, reviste gran importancia para dar nuevo impulso a la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo para abrir la coyuntura de viraje en la construccion de una potencia socialista. 
					
					Todos los participantes en el conclave y los presidentes de las celulas del Partido deben registrar un cambio radical en sus trabajos segun el proposito del Partido llevandose el gran honor y responsabilidad de trabajar en las importantes posiciones por la transformacion de todo el Partido y toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, asevera el editorial y continua:
					
					Las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il realizadas en la construccion y direccion sobre el Partido constituyen patrimonios a ser mantenidos eternamente por el PTC. 
					
					Debemos materializar estrictamente la autoctona idea de los grandes Lideres antecesores en materia de la construccion del Partido y continuar generacion tras generacion la historia y tradicion del PTC, registradas con las victorias. 
					
					Hay que apoyar con fidelidad la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y su idea de dar importancia a las celulas del Partido. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente tiene la firme voluntad de elevar de todos los medios la funcion combativa y el papel de las celulas del Partido para fortalecer mas en lo ideologico y organizativo el PTC y acelerar energicamente la construccion del socialismo en su conjunto. 
					
					Es poderoso el PTC e invencible la causa revolucionaria del Juche por contar con las celulas del Partido de caracter revolucionario y combativo que estan al frente de las filas que marchan con pasos firmes superando todas las dificultades con el poderio de la unidad monolitica y del autofortalecimiento.

articles.title: El ataque preventivo a RPDC producira la derrota final de EE.UU., senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
El ataque preventivo a RPDC producira la derrota final de EE.UU., senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El mandatario norteamericano sigue disparateando que es posible ocurrirse un gravisimo choque con la RPDC y mantiene el proyecto de golpe militar contra esta. Y moviliza a menudo los medios de ataque nuclear para escenificar una furia belica frente a este pais socialista.
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de hoy, y prosigue:
					
					Las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC tiene la firme voluntad de detener las maquinaciones agresivas de EE.UU. y erradicar completamente la fuente de la guerra nuclear para lograr la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					El unico remedio para el aseguramiento de la paz duradera de esas regiones es controlar con el fuego a los maniacos de guerra.
					
					La RPDC nunca se asusta ante el imperio yanqui que trata de desatar la guerra nuclear emplazando sus propiedades estrategicas en el suelo surcoreano y sus alrededores.
					
					Si los compinches de Trump muestren el minimo indicio de la provocacion de guerra, no solo los yanquis, sino tambien las fuerzas seguidoras seran blancos del castigo despiadado de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC.
					
					Y el mundo presenciara con gusto como la Corea del Juche gobierna con el fuego a los maniacos belicosos y como defiende la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos condenan el registro fascista de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos condenan el registro fascista de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 21 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 17, las autoridades policiacas de Japon cometieron a la vez el registro forzoso sobre la sede de la Compania Limitada del Seguro Kumgang de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y sus 11 filiales y las casas del director y otros empleados de la compania bajo la sospecha de que hay indicio de desviacion previa de deposito de la cuenta administrada por la compania.
					Con anterioridad, el grupo de investigacion conjunta integrado por los policias de la Prefactura de Kyoto y de los Departamentos de Kanagawa, Yamaguchi, Shimane y Niigata tambien registro forzosamente la Oficina de la Asociacion de Futbol de Coreanos Residentes en Japon y la casa del ex presidente de la sucursal de la Chongryon en Shibse de la metropoli de Tokio bajo el pretexto de investigar el caso de violacion de la ley de cambio de divisas cometido por una compania japonesa. 
					
					En los comentarios individuales publicados este jueves, los periodicos centrales del pais lo califican de otro grave desafio a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Chongryon y un crimen encaminado a exterminar la Chongryon. 
					
					En el presente registro forzoso los reaccionarios japoneses no consiguieron ningun testigo de la "violacion de la ley", revela Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					En efecto, el registro forzoso sobre la Chongryon no es una investigacion del caso de "violacion de la ley", sino un terror politico premeditado para ultrajar y reprimir esta organizacion ultramarina. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que la presente campana de represion anti-Chongryon fue cometido cuando todos los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas residentes en Japon estaban entristecidos por el 6o aniversario del fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					El hecho testimonia que el alboroto de registro forzoso de las autoridades japonesas es una provocacion politica. 
					
					Minju Joson enfatiza que si los reaccionarios japoneses intensifican la campana anti-Chongryon, pese a la reiterada advertencia de la RPDC, pagaran muy caro y asumiran la responsabilidad del respecto.
